name: DrinkRecommender-YourPersonalBartender
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: drink recommender
des:
Looking for a drink with your meal? How about something to have relaxing with friends and family. Relax! Use the power of Alexa and your voice to answer a few simple questions, and our advanced decisioning will find the perfect drink for you.

Disclaimer: the skill may not be suitable for all ages, and some of the questions and answers make references to alcohol.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
